msbt.message: I suppose if I had to categorize myself as a musical artist, I'd say I'm mostly into . But, I'm also really well known in circles. There's even a book that was basically based on me!
Well, it's not entirely based on a true story. More like, "inspired by a fever dream." And I guess if you're gonna be all literal about it, it's more of a pamphlet, really
Oh, I hate labels as much as anyone. But, you know, I've been putting out albums for years! I guess that makes me superstar. Go figure, .

You ready to hear some classic drama? Alright, buckle up, . I was going to buy some flowers for a friend, but I didn't want to send the wrong impression, you know? The wrong color or arrangement could be disastrous! It could literally change the course of our friendship. Ornot. They're just flowers, right? Ha HA! Sometimes I just need to say it out loud to check myself.

Oh, Hear me out and tell me what to do!So, it's not THAT big of a deal, I guess, now that I actually think about it a little bit. But anywayuhI actually forgot what the problem was in the first place. Ha HA! Well, that worked way better than I expected. Thanks!
Alright, you know that I'm on the cutting edge of fashion, right?Like, if you see me wearing it, you know it's the 's knees.So lately, I've been all about
Skinny jeans!You don't have to be skinny to wear them, you just have to want jeans that practically bind to your skin! The pair I got even comes with a special tool to help you put them on.

Distressed jeans!I'm so tired of regular jeans with their lack of holes and rips.Now, distressed jeans are a little more expensive, but they're worth it for that unique "wow" factor. Like, WOW, I can't believe those jeans are being held together by two strings. Très chic!
Ponchos!Ponchos are the logical evolutionary endpoint of shirts. Just a bag with sleeves and pockets! Plus, they're made of burlap, so you get a really deep exfoliation every time you wear one.
Hey, fashion question for you, How long do you like your pants?

Short pants, eh? But not as short as shorts? What about the length of your shorts? There are long shorts, which are basically pants, and then there are short shorts, which are really short. That's about the long and short of it.

OK, maybe you can help explain something. I like long pants too! But sometimes they're too long. I hate walking on the heels of my pants and ruining them. But I hate rolling up my cuffs! OK, this is kinda crazy, but hear me out What if I just wore pants that were the exact length of my legs? Ugh! The sacrifices I have to make for fashion!
, that's an interesting concept But then you gotta ask yourselfwhat IS normal? I guess I can get down with normal- length pants, as long as they don't LOOK normal. Ugh, normal is the worst!
Youprefer not to wear pants? Ha! Comfort over style. <10_4 />I can't relate at all.
Hey, Want to know the secret of my success?

Alright. You're going to be shocked at how simple this is.Just imagine your favorite person smiling every time you speak. It really helps make me confident. Oh, and say "" a lot too. That never hurts.

Alright, it all comes down to one word. Confidence.Even if you're wrong, just dig in deeper and be confident at all times. Fake it till you make it! If that fails, run away and then pretend you have amnesia.
OK, it's all about visualizing success. Just close your eyes, and imagine the thing you want to accomplish. It's easier if you just visualize something super easy, like eating .

So, here's the thing I'm not a very good dancer.<10_4 /> I'm a world- class dancer! Ha HA! But I can't just go around telling everyone that. It feels kinda self-important or something. So could you, uh, go around telling folks for me?

If you want to know what time it is, I'll be honest with you I have no idea! Since moving to , time has become more of an abstract concept for me. I spend my days counting butterflies instead of minutes on the clockThe sun wakes me up and the moon puts me to sleepI feel so liberated, ! That said What time IS it?
Do you ever think about the future, ? Wonder what things'll be like five years from now? Dream with me for a minute
In a few years, could be the hottest tourist destination on the map. Everything would be different including me. Success and worldwide fame have a tendency to do that.
You and I will have grown and changed. How we look, and even how we dress, will be totally different. Maybe I'll start wearing bandannas. Oh no! What if I start wearing bandannas, ?!

Just think, all sorts of folks could move to this island in the future.Explorers, poets, maybe even a venture capitalist looking to invest in a local entrepreneur. Don't worry—no matter who ends up on our shores, you'll always hold a special place in my heart.

I always get kinda bored at this time of year and start thinking of ways to rebrand myself. LikeI could be a professional star! It won't be easy, but I'll grind my way to the top.On second thoughtthat sounds like work. I'll just THINK about doing it while I sip . Ha HA!
Summer is all about getting out there and playing in the nice weather. Am I right, ?And by "playing," I mean at full volume with choreographed dance moves. Ha HA!
I just love the breezes at this time of year, .I'd rather be too hot and get cooled off by a breeze than never get too hot at all. Ahhh!
Yeah, the snow is pretty, but it's so COLD! Why can't they make hot snow, !Ugh, to be able to wrap myself in a fuzzy snow blanket and take a hot winter's nap
